content: to a cable needle in staggered andalusian cc2 back knit the next stitch slip 3 stitches back to the left needle and r1 k round knit repeat to end of round r2 k5 p1 repeat to end of round r3 k round stockinette mc r4 k2 p1 k3 repeat to end of round r5-r12 repeat r1-r4 2 more times r1-r5 k rounds garter mc r1 p round r2 k round r3 p round stockinette mc r1-r5 k rounds color-me-texture cowl sewroyal co 2 basket weave mc r1-r3 p5 k3 repeat to end of round seed stitch mc r4 remove marker k1 pm k3 yo set up k round k2tog k1 ssk yo repeat to end r1 k1 p1 repeat to end of round r5-7 k3 p5 repeat to end r2 p1 k1 repeat to end of round r8 remove marker unknit the last stitch r3-r4 repeat r1-r2 and place back on the left needle pm yo k2tog k1 ssk yo k3 repeat to chutes & ladders cc2 end of round r9- repeat r1-r6 one more time set up k round r14 r1 k2 sl1 repeat to end of round r15 k3 p5 repeat to 8 stitches before r2 repeat r1 *k2 sl1* marker r3 k5 sl1 repeat to end of round k3 p4 slip last stitch off needle r4 repeat r1 *k2 sl1* remove m slip_stitch onto left needle r5 k2 sl1 k3 repeat to end of round and pm r6 repeat r1 *k2 sl1* r7 repeat r3 *k5 sl1* r8 repeat r1 *k2 sl1* linen cc1 r9 repeat r1 *k2 sl1* set up k to 1 stitch before m kfb r10 k round r1 k1 slwyif repeat to 1 stitch before marker knit ribbing mc r2 slwyif k1 repeat to 1 stitch before marker slwyif r1 k2 p2 repeat to end of row r3-10 repeat r1-r2 4 more times repeat r1 till ribbing measures 1 r11 repeat r1 r12 slwyif k1 repeat to 3 stitches before marker slwyif k2tog bind off any stretchy bind off or your preferred method i used k1 k1 slip both stitches to the left needle and k2tog through the back loops k1 slip both stitches to the left needles and k2tog through the back loops repeat to end finishing cut the yarn leaving a 6-8 tail and pull through the last loop weave in ends and block color-me-texture cowl sewroyal co 3
